mapper.update: update AUTH_MENU set MENU_URL = #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MENU_NAME = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERMS = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select MENU_ID, MENU_URL, MENU_NAME, PARENT_ID, PERMS, TYPE, ICON, ORDER_NUM, UPDATE_DATE from AUTH_MENU
